name: MINIGUN MINER
description:
KNOCK THEIR BLOCK'S OFF!
DIG.BUILD.DESTROY
USE THE MIGHTY MINI GUN, THE MOST POWERFUL WEAPON IN THE UNIVERSE TO TUNNEL AND DESTROY FULLY DESTRUCTIBLE LEVELS.
THE SMASH HIT, FAST PACED MULTIPLAYER FPS VOXEL BLOCK SHOOTER. BATTLE PEOPLE AROUND THE WORLD.
USE TNT OR ENDLESS BULLETS TO DESTROY THE LEVELS AND BUILD BASES WITH BLOCKS TO DEFEND YOURSELF.
NO ADS. 100% CONTENT UNLOCKED & READY TO ROCK. 100% AWESOME.

**NOW WITH ADDED SINGLE PLAYER ZOMBIE HORDE MODE!**

Have you ever wanted to use weapons to tunnel and destroy full levels?
Mini Gun Miner lets you vaporize your way through awesome environments using the ultimate weapon : The Mini Gun!
Dig under your enemies bases, pop up behind unsuspecting foes, create vast tunnel networks using your weapon as a tool of doom and digging.
Build using our block system, create bases, walls, defenses and cunning traps. Funnel your enemies into your sights!
Multiplayer mode allows you to unleash your plans and tactics on your friends and foes around the world
If you want to slay some cube faced zombies, play single player in Horde mode carnage. Use your Mini Gun to dig trenches, and traps!
Choose from many different character skins.
the best bit? NO ADS. NO IN APP PURCHASES. ALL CONTENT UNLOCKED FOR YOUR DEADLY DIGGING PLEASURE.
BOOM!!
